Soheir Al Bably (14 Febụwarị 1937 - 21 Nọvemba 2021) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Institute of Theatrical Arts
Ọ pụtara n'egwuregwu Madrast Al-Mushaghebeen na 1973, nakwa n'ihe ngosiputa nke ndụ Raya na Sakina na 1985. O so onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama bụ Salah Zulfikar mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro ise, di ya nke abụọ bụ Mounir Mourad.
